text: Best way would be to feed your hubl data into the initial state via the |tojson filter, but obviously this means any subsequent filtering has to be done in react.
What Mark is describing we do in the HubSpot react boilerplate <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-react-boilerplate/blob/master/src/modules/app.module/module.html>
Weâ€™re doing it with the module fields but you can pass any data in that way.
